item.title: Tips in Latex for your Master Thesis
item.description: Introduction: If you want to use Latex without issues regarding installations or system operative compatibilities, you should use an online editor like Overleaf. Overleaf allows free registration with the option to share with 1 person, in free tier, that can be your assessor. Requirements: To understand this tutorial we need basic knowledge about: Latex MS Word Formulas: Normally with the project thesis we use ms word and then create your thesis.
